title: Counseling
content: I got 7.5k in pessat exam. They are telling after first session of counseling, 1040 seats are available. Should I keep hopes on pessat?

comments.body: Bro I'm coping hard RN for ECE ec campus.
So you are telling me that it's tough for me to get any rank right?
No bro. I'm hoping for the best! What branch are you expecting btw?
Any branch is okay for me broðŸ™‚
As you say bro thank you ðŸ™‚ how much rank did you get?
Oh. Do you think you will get ece in ec campus ?
I'm hoping for that bro. Or else will see in round 2.
